Package index

All functions

adjusted_means
BT21 adusted means
barplot_noTrend
BT22 default plot settings.
barplot_plot_frame
BT22 default plot settings.
barplot_plot_frz
BT22 default plot settings.
barplot_table_plot_pattern
BT22 default plot settings.
calc_plot_lims()
Calculate different plot limit values.
clean_data()
Fill in and rename necessary columns
cmyk()
Set colours as cmyk values.
combine_plots()
Combine different ggplots
construct_directional_sig()
Calculate the significance descriptions for the 'Mindeststandards'
construct_grouping_var()
Merge two grouping var columns into one.
construct_label()
Construct labels
construct_percent()
Multiply Values in Columns by 100 to build percentages.
filter_plot_dat()
Filter specified rows from plot_dat objects.
filter_rows()
Extract or remove rows from prepared data.
gsub_plot_dat()
gsub() for lists and data.frames.
lineplot_2x3
BT22 default plot settings.
lineplot_4x4
BT22 default plot settings.
lineplot_4x4_3groups
BT22 default plot settings.
min_stand
BT21 minimum standards.
plot_background_lines()
Plot background lines.
plot_braces()
Plot braces below plot.
plot_lineplot()
Plot a lineplot.
plot_lines()
Adds a layer with trend lines to a ggplot.
plot_points()
Plot Points.
plot_single_lineplot()
Plot a single lineplot. Multiple of this lineplots are combined as tiles to the output of plot_lineplot().
plot_tablebar()
Plot a table and/or a barchart.
plot_x_axis()
Plot the x-Axis.
plot_y_axis()
Plot a y-axis plot. Can be merged with other plots for a customisable y-axis.
plotsettings_lineplot()
Set parameters for the lineplots.
plotsettings_tablebarplot()
Set parameters for the barplots.
prep_data_blocks()
Prepare distinct building blocks, from which the data.frames for the plot-functions can be build by combining them.
prep_plot() experimental
Prepare trend data for plotting
save_plot()
Wrapper for grDevices::pdf().
set_plot_coords()
Set the x- and y-coordinates for a plot.
set_scales()
Set the colours, pointshapes and linetypes for lineplot.
standardize_column_width()
Calculate the column widths for plots that should be later combined with combine_plots().
standardize_pattern_spacing()
Calculate the pattern spacing, so it is equal within a plot. Currently works only for two combined plots!
theme_line()
Theme for lineplot.
theme_table()
Theme for table plotted with ggplot2.
theme_table_col()
Theme for a table column.
theme_y_axis()
Theme for a y-axis plot.
trend_books
BT21 Books trend
